professional.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
professional.summary: Passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expertise in modern JavaScript frameworks, cloud technologies, and agile development practices. I love creating user-centric solutions that solve real-world problems.

experience.title: Senior Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Leading development of microservices architecture serving 100K+ users. Built and maintained React applications with Node.js backends, implemented CI/CD pipelines, and mentored junior developers.
achievements: Reduced application load time by 40% through performance optimization
Led a team of 4 developers in rebuilding the main product dashboard
Implemented automated testing that increased code coverage from 60% to 95%
Designed and developed RESTful APIs handling 1M+ requests daily

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed customer-facing web applications using React, Node.js, and AWS. Collaborated with design and product teams to deliver high-quality user experiences.
achievements: Built responsive web applications serving 50K+ monthly active users
Integrated third-party APIs including Stripe, SendGrid, and AWS services
Improved application security by implementing OAuth 2.0 and JWT authentication

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.description: Focused on frontend development using React and modern JavaScript. Worked closely with UX designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces.
achievements: Developed responsive components used across 10+ different product pages
Implemented real-time features using WebSocket connections
Optimized bundle size reducing initial load time by 25%

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Focused on software engineering, algorithms, and data structures. Participated in ACM programming competitions and contributed to open-source projects.
Intensive 9-month program covering modern web development technologies including React, Node.js, and databases.

projects.title: EcoTracker - Sustainability App
projects.description: A mobile-first web application that helps users track their carbon footprint and discover eco-friendly alternatives. Built with React Native and Node.js backend.

projects.title: TaskFlow - Project Management Tool
projects.description: Collaborative project management platform with real-time updates, file sharing, and team communication features. Supports agile workflows and sprint planning.

projects.title: CryptoPortfolio Tracker
projects.description: Real-time cryptocurrency portfolio tracker with advanced analytics, price alerts, and market insights. Integrates with multiple exchange APIs.

projects.title: WeatherWise - Smart Weather App
projects.description: Intelligent weather application with location-based forecasts, weather alerts, and outfit recommendations based on weather conditions.

seoData.title: Alex Johnson - Senior Full Stack Developer
seoData.description: Passionate full-stack developer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications. Expertise in modern JavaScript frameworks, cloud technologies, and agile development practices.
seoData.keywords: Full Stack Developer, JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, TypeScript, Python, AWS, Docker, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, GraphQL, Next.js, Express.js, San Francisco, Web Development, Software Engineer
